section_about_us.description: HADIPURWANTO LAW OFFICE (HLO) is an independent law firm based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Our team of lawyers possesses expertise and wide connections across various sectors, offering exceptional experience in providing tailored legal solutions for every client.
